metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17516 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: scripts/inspect_webbrowser.py in Reddit Terminal Viewer (RTV) 1.19.0 doesnot validate strings before launching the program specified by the BROWSERenvironment variable, which might allow remote attackers to conductargument-injection attacks via a crafted URL.

criterions.comment: rtv: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
